title: Tytgat Chocolat
overview: Jasper Vloemans works at chocolate manufacturing company Tytgat Chocolate, a firm that employs mentally-challenged workers for the packaging of their products. He falls in love with one of his colleagues: Tina, a girl originally from Kosovo. When Tina is suddenly deported back to her home country, Jasper and his friends set out on a road trip to find her.
